original_text: The Jewish leaders were angry. They told Peter and John that they must obey them. Then they let Peter and John go free. All the people there were praising God because of the miracle. So the leaders could not decide how to punish Peter and John.
korean_text: 관리들이 백성들 때문에 그들을 어떻게 처벌할지 방법을 찾지 못하고 다시 위협하여 놓아 주었으니 이는 모든 사람이 그 된 일을 보고 하나님께 영광을 돌림이라

sentences.original_text: Then they let Peter and John go free
All the people there were praising God
sentences.korean_translation: 거기 있던 모든 사람들이 하나님을 찬양하고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: So the leaders could not decide
how to punish Peter and John
